title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Personalized Learning Design Based on E-Learning Service Interoperability

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and Learning Management System (LMS) usage
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can describe the basic structure and metadata standards of learning objects (LOs).
Learners can design integration strategies for learning objects to resolve interoperability issues.
Learners can configure environments for personalized language learning content across multiple devices.
Learners can apply criteria to evaluate data compatibility between e-learning services.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
